name: Lost In The Void (crashie)
description:
you are an astronaut trying to explore new planets, but suddenly your spaceship crashes into another planet, and its parts split all over the place! try to collect all the space ship parts to rebuild your spaceship, and place flags in order to not get lost, and don't fall into the void!

this game was made for the beginners circle jam #3 hosted by angry smiles, its my first game jam i ever entered, and i learned alot! if you have any feedback or things you think would make the game more interesting, please feel free to leave it in the comments :D ty!

Controls:

Mouse - Look Around

WASD or Arrow Keys - Moving Left, Right, Forward, Backward

Hold Shift While Moving - Run

Space - Jump

F - Place Flag

Click On Parts - Collect Part

P - Pause Game

if you are having difficulty finding all the parts, you can get all the locations from this full gameplay video: (WARNING SPOILERS):
